definition: weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: Multi-access interference is the key problem which restricts the performance of CDMA(code division multiple access) system.
sentences.chinese: 多址干擾是影響碼分多址系統性能的關鍵問題。

sentences.english: This paper also studied the design of G function family for multi-access approach.
sentences.chinese: 同時也研究了針對G函數族設計的碼分多址方式。

sentences.english: It also is known as frequency- hopping code division multiple access (FH-CDMA).
sentences.chinese: 跳頻也稱爲跳頻碼分多址。

sentences.english: Optical codes(OCs )are critical to optical codes division multiple access(OCDMA)net-works.
sentences.chinese: 光地址碼直接影響到光碼分多址網絡的整體性能。

sentences.english: Finally, a modified scheme of FFH-OCDMA system was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎上，提出了光跳頻碼分多址系統的改進方案。
